subject: Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Belmont Stakes
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Doug O’Neill, the trainer of Triple Crown hopeful I’ll Have Another, was suspended 45 days on Thursday for exceeding the allowable limit for total carbon dioxide in one of his horses.
snippet: Doug O’Neill, the trainer of Triple Crown hopeful I’ll Have Another, was suspended 45 days on Thursday for exceeding the allowable limit for total carbon dioxide in one of his horses.
